DBParameterGroupName.description: The name of the DB parameter group. Constraints:   Must be the name of an existing DB parameter group   Must be 1 to 255 alphanumeric characters   First character must be a letter   Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens

Parameters.description: An array of parameter names, values, and the apply method for the parameter update. At least one parameter name, value, and apply method must be supplied; subsequent arguments are optional. A maximum of 20 parameters can be modified in a single request. Valid Values (for the application method): immediate | pending-reboot   You can use the immediate value with dynamic parameters only. You can use the pending-reboot value for both dynamic and static parameters, and changes are applied when you reboot the DB instance without failover.
